game.name: Green Project
game.shortDescription: Post apocalyptic survival farming, green the world to survive !

reviewHighlights.text: This game has been flat out abandoned. Don't buy it unless you know what you're walking into.
Kind of interesting idea that keep you busy for few days. But very strange crafting system, lack of information (and not updated wiki) makes it hard t...
